definition: curtain or screen/canopy or tent/headquarters of a general/act (of a play)

sentences.english: Yesterday was the last time for me to play the Jpananese drams before the spectators.
sentences.chinese: 在众人面前的演奏昨天也迎来了其暂时的帷幕。

sentences.english: With the technics of purdah infusion to stem water, surface sinking of large area can be prevented.
sentences.chinese: 采用帷幕注浆堵水工艺可防止大面积地表塌陷的发生。

sentences.english: A great chocolate-coloured pall lowered over heaven.
sentences.chinese: 一种巧克力色的帷幕从天上挂下来。

sentences.english: The curtains opened to reveal a darkened stage.
sentences.chinese: 帷幕拉开，显出暗沉沉的舞台。

sentences.english: They partitioned the room off with a curtain.
sentences.chinese: 他们用一块帷幕把房间隔开。

sentences.english: The 47th Paris International Air Show has kicked off at Bourget, a Paris suburb.
sentences.chinese: 第47届巴黎国际航展在巴黎市郊布尔热拉开帷幕。

sentences.english: In the dhama the curtain or veil between the material and spiritual worlds is thin.
sentences.chinese: 在圣地物质世界和灵性世界之间的窗帘或帷幕很薄。

sentences.english: Calculation formula of cement-mixed proportion of curtains for cutting off water in deep-cement-mixing piles is deduced.
sentences.chinese: 推导了深层搅拌桩止水帷幕水泥掺入比计算公式。

sentences.english: Applause is sweeping through the trees.
sentences.chinese: 帷幕降下，树丛间掌声雷动。

sentences.english: Five giant backdrops beckon the visitor into the Trianon garden by night.
sentences.chinese: 五面巨幅帷幕将参观者引入夜色中的特里阿农园。

sentences.english: Pioneer is a concept shoe that coverts kinetic walking energy into electrical energy.
sentences.chinese: 此双概念鞋拉开了动能转变为电能的帷幕。

sentences.english: The sixth Asian Winter Games raised its curtain last evening in Changchun, China.
sentences.chinese: 第六届亚洲冬运会周日晚在中国重庆拉开帷幕。

sentences.english: The Shanghai World Expo will open in two weeks.
sentences.chinese: 再过两个星期，上海世博会就要拉开帷幕。

sentences.english: The official timed race began on Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 正式计时赛于星期日拉开帷幕。

sentences.english: As the curtains were pulled apart, we saw the actors on the stage.
sentences.chinese: 帷幕启开时，我们看到了台上的演员。

sentences.english: A few hundred cyclists have even braved the pot-holed roads for a "Tour de Timor" mountain-bike race.
sentences.chinese: 一场环帝汶自行车赛在凹凸不平的路上拉开帷幕。

definition: (fig.) to raise the curtain/to lift the curtain/to be a curtain raiser for
the curtain drops/the end of the show
to beat the gong to open a performance
to arrive as planned/right on schedule
curtain or screen/canopy or tent/headquarters of a general/act (of a play)
"Red Poppies", novel by 阿來|阿来[A1 lai2]
lit. the dust has settled (idiom)/fig. to get sorted out/to be finalized
large-scale Chinese opera/Beijing opera/major dramatic production (movie, TV series etc)
